subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: When José Mourinho left Chelsea in 2007, it appeared the divorce was final. But Mourinho, who has labeled himself the Special One, has returned to Stamford Bridge, five and a half years later.
snippet: When José Mourinho left Chelsea in 2007, it appeared the divorce was final. But Mourinho, who has labeled himself the Special One, has returned to Stamford Bridge, five and a half years later.
